overview: Alexa and Ricky have nurtured a mutual crush in the office for years, but Ricky is married. The day comes when both are out of town on a business trip. Alexa becomes determined to seduce him on their last day there, and sits down alone with him under the guise of work. The two awkwardly sidestep the issue of their attraction, but once he removes his wedding ring, she picks up the aggression.
title: You Took Off Your Ring
